text:
December 18, 1957
Dr* Anna Hyer
Associate Executive Secretary
Department of Audio-Visual Instruction
National Education Association
1201 Sixteenth Street, N.W.
Washington 6, D* C.
Dear Anni
I imagine I'm ’way late, but just learned of your various new jobs
They’re in excellent hands, Ann, and we wish you every success.
If things are popping there as fast as here, you’ll (continue to)
be a mighty busy lady. More power to you.
Sincerely,
HJS/dfc
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
